channel.title: Docs on Belfry Projects
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Belfry Projects

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Introduction # Bells are often heard but not seen! Ringing bells full circle is not just a church activity; it is part of our national heritage. A four hundred year old tradition, it offers challenges and requires skills which most people are able to achieve. Whilst it is based at the parish church and is a part of the worshipping Christian community, a band of ringers is part of the social life of the parish.
